name: ERP PRO
tag_list: microsoft-dynamics-ax, microsoft-dynamics-nav, qlikview, business-intelligent, it-support, microsoft--net-development
overview:
ERP PRO is an innovative and growing information technologies and consulting enterprise founded on January 22, 2007. Several major projects were implemented rapidly in the first few years of activity thanks to the qualifications and previous experience of the staff. To achieve our targets, we continuously acquire the latest technologies and develop our skills.

Our customers are major and medium enterprises in different business areas that in addtion to existing standard enterprise resource planning (ERP) resources also need customized supplements and improvements. We consider establishment and maintenance of a long term relationship with our customers as a priority with a flexible approach and professional attitude towards their requirements and needs.

Company Main Services:

  • Microsoft Dynamics Ax/Nav Development and Consulting
  • Custom Microsoft .Net application Development
  • Qlikview (Business Intelligent) Reporting And Analysis
  • IT support
